alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:50AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan County through 130 AM MDT... At 1250 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Ellsworth, or 28 miles south of Rushville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Billys Lake, Wolf Hill and Argo Hill. This includes Highway 250 near mile marker 13, and between mile markers 15 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
